text: Kampong Parit (Malay for Parit Village) is a village situated in the south- western part of Brunei-Muara District, Brunei, within the mukim (subdistrict) of Sengkurong. The postcode for Kampong Parit is BH1223. == Geography == As a subdivision, Kampong Parit shares boundaries with Kampong Masin to the north, Kampong Junjongan to the east, Kampong Pengkalan Batu to the south, Kampong Panchor Murai to the south-west, and Kampong Batong to the west. == References == Parit
title: Kampong Parit, Pengkalan Batu
